其實用conservation of momentum 解唔到咩？
一個物體explode做兩舊，M變小V變大？

M never change, it just splits, with all of its momentum. you cannot transfer momentum from one particles to the others with force applied.

M = original mass M1V1= brand's ship momentum M2V2 = cooper's
M1V1 + M2V2 = MV
V2 is negative
So in absolute value
M1V1 = MV + M2V2
M1 < M
V1 must be greater than V
